adrFormatAddress: 200 E 24th St Suite 101, New York, NY 10010-3916, USA

originalText.text: Highly recommend this practice for anybody looking. Moved to New York a year ago and have had a great experience with Bar and Smith. My visits have ranged from dental cleanings to wisdom teeth removals, with the process being top notch and easy each time. Great environment with a friendly staff, would recommend Dr. Hagedorn if you go.

My visits have ranged from dental cleanings to wisdom teeth removals, with the process being top notch and easy each time. originalText.text:
I echo every other review and highly recommend this practice.
I recently saw Dr. Smith about a concern I had and he couldn’t have been more thorough in his explanation and reassuring in his delivery.  Any dentist I’ve seen there is highly professional as are all of the dental assistants.  And, the office staff is friendly and helpful.

text.text:

originalText.text:
I have been a customer of Bar & Smith Dental for the past four years. This is without a doubt the best dental practice I have ever visited.

Beyond their fantastic dental care, their customer service is exceptional - everyone is extremely friendly; their front desk are very flexible and understanding when I have had to move an appointment and I feel very comfrotable and at ease there - which is a rare feeling for someone that has never been a fan of visiting the dentist!

text.text:
I have been a customer of Bar & Smith Dental for the past four years. This is without a doubt the best dental practice I have ever visited.

Beyond their fantastic dental care, their customer service is exceptional - everyone is extremely friendly; their front desk are very flexible and understanding when I have had to move an appointment and I feel very comfrotable and at ease there - which is a rare feeling for someone that has never been a fan of visiting the dentist!

originalText.text: I used to be terrified of the dentist, like an abnormal amount of fear, but I have now been to Bar and Smith Dental twice and I no longer dread appointments. Dr. Bar is great and so is every single person in that office. I had never had a hygienist ask if my teeth got sensitive during cleanings before going here or actually care to check in during. I have never had to wait at all. The entire appointment is so efficient. I could not recommend Bar and Smith Dental more.

text.text: I used to be terrified of the dentist, like an abnormal amount of fear, but I have now been to Bar and Smith Dental twice and I no longer dread appointments. Dr. Bar is great and so is every single person in that office. I had never had a hygienist ask if my teeth got sensitive during cleanings before going here or actually care to check in during. I have never had to wait at all. The entire appointment is so efficient. I could not recommend Bar and Smith Dental more.

originalText.text: The staff here at Bar and Smith Dental are very professional and kind. I was concerned because I needed major dental work with one of my teeth, and they approached it direct and efficiently. I had two previous consultations with other dental offices, but I picked Bar and Smith as they had a faster and more cost-efficient plan for the procedures I needed done.
